Package edu.cmu.deiis.annotators

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractEvaluator
    The AbstractEvaluator is an abstract class that should be extended by any class evluating a list of AnswerScores
    AbstractQAAnnotator
    AbstractQAAnnotator is an abstract class for a basic Q&A System.
    AbstractSingleQuestionScorer
    AbstractSingleQuestionScorer is an abstract class for AnswerScorers designed to target documents with a single question.
    BigramAnnotator
    BigramAnnotator takes Annotation spans and outputs NGram annotations for each bigram in the span.
    GoldAnswerScorer  
    NGramAnnotator
    NGramAnnotator is an abstract class for all *-Gram Annotators.
    NGramOverlapScorer
    NGramOverlapScorer scores an Answer against a Question based on how many overlapping NGrams they contain
    TestElementAnnotator
    TestElementAnnotator takes document text and locates Question and Answer spans.
    TokenAnnotator
    TokenAnnotator is responsible for taking text spans and outputting tokens for them.
    TokenOverlapScorer
    TokenOverlapScorer assigns scores to Answers based on the number of overlapping tokens Answers share with Questions
    TopNEvaluator
    The TopN Evaluator evaluates Precision for the top N results of a QA system.
    TrigramAnnotator
    TrigramAnnotator takes Annotation spans and outputs NGram annotations for each trigram in the span.
    UnigramAnnotator
    UnigramAnnotator takes Annotation spans and outputs NGram annotations for each unigram in the span.
